backend/main.mo: Implements contact request storage and user profile management with access control checks for viewing and editing data.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries linking features to files, components, and test IDs for build tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of frontend files and their purposes for reference.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Configures asset publishing to include the .well-known directory for domain verification.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styling and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, fonts, and mounting the React app root.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Lists domain names used for Internet Computer custom domain verification.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Allows Googlebot, Bingbot, PerplexityBot, and all other crawlers full access to all site paths.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component that assembles all landing page sections into a single layout.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Renders an about section with descriptive text, trust indicators, and an accompanying image.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Provides a Formspree-backed contact form with required fields and styled inputs.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Displays the contact form alongside contact details and social media links.
Renders a features grid with icons, titles, and descriptions plus a header and CTA linking to YouTube.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays the site footer with brand info, navigation links, legal links, and a credit bar.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Shows a hero banner with background image, headline, description, and buttons that scroll to sections.
frontend/src/components/LandingHeader.ts: Implements a responsive header with logo, scroll-aware styling, desktop and mobile navigation, and a booking button.
frontend/src/components/ScheduleConsulta: Provides a booking section that loads and displays a Calendly embed when the user clicks the booking button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling identity loading, login, logout, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContactReque: Empty or placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light/dark theming with OKLCH colors and base utility styles.
frontend/src/lib/scrollToSection.ts: Provides a smooth scrolling helper that offsets for the header height when navigating to page sections.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including sessionStorage support and hash-based routing handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, breakpoints, and plugins using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for the landing page build.
